title: N2O4 NO2 equil - mixture is lighter color at low T

content.question: Which of the following statements best helps to explain why the contents of the tube containing the equilibrium mixture turned a lighter color when the tube was placed into an ice bath?

choices.label: The ice bath lowered the activation energy.
The ice bath raised the activation energy.

skill.text: 6.F: Explain the connection between experimental results and chemical concepts, processes, or theories.
